name: 2002 FIFA World Cup
summary:
World Cup 2002 is the official game of the 17th FIFA World Cup, held in Korea and Japan between May 31 and June 30. It is based on the engine of FIFA Soccer 2002, so experienced Fifa players can get used for it quite fast.

It is based on the 2002 World Cup - Korea and Japan, and includes all of the countries who promoted to the World Cup, and a lot more. Small statistics are shown for every country - their last biggest win, appearances at the World Cup, etc.

The stadium and all players are really detailed. The player's texture's resolution is so high, you can easily recognize most of them. The stadium is big and impressive, and full of colored crowd.

As in FIFA Soccer 2002, animation were taken from real players, with motion sensors. Thus, some new animation were added - new sliding, falling, and more.

And the newest feature of 2002 FIFA World Cup, is the air ball control model. You can take balls from the air, and have much more control with them - creating great goals from the air.

name: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
summary: Based on the Jules Verne novel, this graphic adventure provides a first-person perspective on the realm of Captain Nemo and his enormous submarine craft, The Nautilus. Players guide three brave explorers -- marine biologist Pierre Aronnax, his assistant Conseil, and the rough-and-tumble seaman Ned Land -- who had boarded the warship Abraham Lincoln and embarked on a mission to hunt down an impossibly enormous "sea monster" reported by several merchant ships.

name: 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa
summary:
EA SPORTS 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa will feature all the emotion and passion of the fiercest national rivalries battling on the world's biggest stage, with all 199 national teams that took part in qualification, all 10 official licensed stadiums to be used in South Africa and stadiums from each qualifying region. Gamers will be able to play as their home nation from qualification right through to a virtual reproduction of the FIFA World Cup Final and feel what it is like to score the goal that lifts a nation. Everything fans love about the World Cup will come to life in spectacular detail, including confetti rain, streamers, & fireworks--just like the official tournament.

Players choose a team from the 199 nations available and compete against the computer or against other players through online gaming services PlayStation Network or Xbox Live. All 10 official World Cup stadiums are available for play.

EA has announced that there will be gameplay improvements over FIFA 10, such as a higher rate of player fatigue for matches at higher altitudes, with an advantage to a home team who plays at a higher altitude against an away team who does not. EA has also announced that players can get injured outside of international matches.

name: 2014 FIFA World Cup Brazil
summary: Lead your country to World Cup glory while experiencing all the fun, excitement, and drama of Football's greatest event.

name: 2006 FIFA World Cup
summary:
Celebrating the 2006 FIFA World Cup Germany - the world's largest sporting event - 2006 FIFA World Cup brings you to the games with the world's superstar players, 12 official stadiums that will be used at 2006 FIFA World Cup Germany and stadiums from each qualifying region. Gamers can play as their favorite team from qualification right through to a virtual reproduction of the tournament in Germany.

In addition to enabling gamers to participate in the 2006 FIFA World Cup Germany by taking control of one of 127 national teams, the game features new compelling modes of play, including the Global Challenge that recreates classic moments in FIFA World Cup history. Furthermore, the game supports up to eight-way multiplayer matches and boasts a plethora of in-game unlockable content such as legendary players and exclusive apparel.

Created by Italian web developer Gabriele Cirulli, 2048 is a single-player sliding tile puzzle video game that challenges players to combine numbered tiles on a 4x4 grid to create a tile with the number 2048. Originally written in JavaScript and CSS over a weekend, it was released in March 2014 as free and open-source software.

name: 2010: The Graphic Action Game
summary:
2010: The Graphic Action Game is a puzzle/maze game with elements from 2010: Odyssey Two where the player must save the Discovery from crashing onto the surface of Jupiter's volcanic moon, Io. The player must choose one of about five circuits to work on in one of the ship's critical systems: Engine, Power, Communications, Life Support, and the HAL 9000. Successful power routing of a circuit makes each system slowly come on-line. It takes three powered circuits for minimum function, but four provides more leeway for success.

On-Line engines and power can be activated for an orbital boost, but too long a burn will damage circuit components. HAL 9000 can power undamaged circuits you assign to him, although at a much slower pace than the player. Communications allow a powered HAL 9000 to inform you of success/failure at powering a circuit assigned to him. Life Support gives more protection against EMPs damaging powered circuits, which require repair and repowering.

name: 2064: Read Only Memories
summary: In Neo-San Francisco, a vibrant city of low life and high tech, you will witness the world’s first sapient robot learning to grow and live as you become embroiled in the darkest scandal of 2064.

2088 is a 2D top-down shooter set in the future. The player controls the gunfighter, and starts in the centre of the screen. He must catch the green things, and destroy enemies, for example saucers, exploding pods or space snakes. The game is played on a small stage. Laser bolts are outside the arena, and the player must avoid their shots. After passing the arena, the player gets in a spaceship and flies through the field of meteorites.

name: 200% Mixed Juice!
summary: 200% Mixed Juice! is the 10th Anniversary game of Orange Juice, an old school RPG featuring a 200% mix of Orange Juice characters.

name: 20XX
summary: 20XX is a co-op-friendly action platformer roguelite. Explore procedurally generated levels, collect new weapons and abilities, purchase upgrades, and crush ferocious bosses! If you are a fan of roguelikes or Mega Man, 20XX is for you!

name: 2029 Online
summary: 2029 Online is a sci-fi based MMORPG. The story of 2029 Online centers around a galactic inter-species discord on an alien planet called Helen Continent. Conflict has become entrenched, as each culture refuses to back down and fights for its own survival and domination. As the foundations of justice and order crumble, a mass of brave people have risen up to defend peace on this war-stricken planet. As you progress in the game, you can easily develop your skills and gain a reputation as a raider of unique skill. If you hit a high level, you can run feral raids to solidify your heroic reputation, but remember, this MMO is not just about killing, but about fame and faith.

name: 20Something
summary: 20Something is an interactive fiction game, a candid and honest look at dating, relationships and navigating life as a man in his twenties for whom interactions can provoke a little extra soul searching.

name: 2017 VR
summary: “2017” is an excellent VR Co-op Survival game, in which players from all over the world gather together in teams to try and hold back the zombie hordes and prevent the outbreak from spreading any further. You won't miss it!

name: 2005 Minigame Multicart
summary:
Atari 2600 fans Chris Walton (cd-w), Fred Quimby (batari), Bob Montgomery (vdub_bobby), and Zach Matley (Zach) submitted several 1K entries for the 2005 Minigame Competition. They have now teamed up to release their seven 1K games in a single 2005 Minigame Multicart, complete with an on-screen menu that allows easy selection of the games as well as instructions. 
 
The included games are: Hunchy, Jetman, Nightrider, Zirconium, Rocket Command, M-4, and Marble Jumper

name: 2013: Infected Wars
summary: The year is 2013 and the world as we know it has come to an end. Society has completely broken down. The Scourge as it has become known is an engineered virus stolen and then released upon the world by Al-Qaeda. It was intended to send the West back to the Stone Age by turning their citizens into crazed mutated beasts. In this power, vacuum Al-Qaeda planned to create a new world order.

name: 20 Billion Wives
summary: A sequel to the cult-hit idle game 10 Billion Wives. There are now at least double the wives.

name: 2020: My Country
summary: A city building game.

name: 2088: The Cryllan Mission - The Second Scenario
summary: A second scenario for the Apple IIgs-exclusive science fiction RPG 2088: The Cryllan Mission.

name: 2088: The Cryllan Mission
summary: An Apple IIgs-exclusive science fiction RPG in the style of the Ultima series.

name: 2048 Knight
summary: A puzzle game from Retro Box.

name: 2034 A.C. (After Canada)
summary: A point-and-click adventure game.

name: 2034: A.C. (After Canada) II
summary: A point-and-click adventure game.

name: 20.8 Percent
summary: 20.8 Percent is an experimental game for OUYA with the mantra of "Search, survive, reflect."

name: 2048: Bee the Swarm
summary: This is Bee The Swarm's rendering of the classic 2048 puzzle game.

name: 2048 Infinite: The Circle of Fifths
summary: A musical 2048 variant centered around the circle of fifths.

name: 20,000 Leagues Above the Clouds
summary: Captain your airship across the skies in this project from That Brain.

name: 20th Century Video Almanac
summary: An interactive almanac game released for the 3DO. Developed by The Software Toolworks.

name: 2000:1 - A Space Felony: Or How I Came to Value My Life and Murder Mercilessly
summary:
2000:1 - A Space Felony is a murder mystery courtroom drama set aboard the USS Endowment, an interplanetary Spacecraft that has lost communication with Earth.

Utilising your camera and demonstrating your keen detective skills, you must document your findings, and piece together the crew's final hours from the aftermath. This photographic evidence is then applied in a cross-examination of the crime's prime suspect; MAL, the ship's on-board AI system.

If MAL is guilty, it is your responsibility to deactivate him.

A follow-up(ish) to 2016's critically acclaimed(ish) "Disorient On The Murder Express", National Insecurities returns with a much more ambitious investigation that walks the line between science and fiction, resulting in some kind of combination of the two.

name: 2003 AtariAge Holiday Cart
summary: The 2003 AtariAge Holiday Cart was created by Andrew Davie and given out to anyone purchasing $50 or more from the AtariAge Store during the 2003 holiday season. The cart displays an image seen below and flips horizontally every few seconds. This was just a demo for Andrew Davie's script to display higher resolution images.

name: 2001 Alien Combat
summary: A one-on-one beat 'em up game. The player controls a blue humanoid and must defeat alien opponents within a time limit. There are numerous moves available, triggered with the number keys: a jump, a lethal front kick, a rotation kick, various punches, and more. The player also can throw knives at the opponent, but there's a limited amount of knives, represented by a dwindling bar beneath the player's life bar.

name: 2025: Battle for Fatherland
summary: Futuristic warfare from Akella and Primal Software.

name: 2010: The Text Adventure Game
summary: Text adventure based on the movie "2010" based on the novel by Arthur C. Clarke.

name: 2007: A Spectrum Odyssey
summary: A quiz game.

name: 2064: Read Only Memories Integral
summary: 2064: Read Only Memories is a new cyberpunk adventure that will take you on a journey of puzzle-solving and exploring as you investigate the mysterious world and characters of Neo-San Francisco.

name: 2048 5x5
summary:
"2048 5x5” is easy game that will keep you hooked for hours!
Enjoy 5x5 tiles~!

name: 2048 Hex
summary: 2048 Hex is a classic logic game with new mechanics! Connect the hexagons by moving them around the game board to get 2048. The hexagon board provides a new unforgettable experience, and 3 different sizes of the board will not let you get bored. It has a nice color scheme and smooth animation!

name: 2060 Cyber Racer
summary: 2060 Cyber Racer is a racing game set in a cyberspace like environment complete with the Matrix-like imagery of black and green digits covering the landscape. Choose between two cars with different characteristics, pick a colour and set out on one of the three tracks available to get the best lap time possible. The high scores are saved in the game for future bragging rights.

name: 20.000 Leagues Under the Sea: Captain Nemo
summary: Discover the furthest recesses of the Nautilus, take the helm and pass through the Isthmus of Suez, gaze upon hitherto unseen places under the waves! But beware, the apparently peaceful depths can hide terrible dangers!

name: 20 em 1
summary:
20 em 1 (translated as 20 in 1) is a collection of 20 original games developed and published by Brazilian company Tectoy for the Sega Master System.

The cartridge was only sold bundled with a certain version of Tectoy's Master System III Compact, and as such had no box of its own and was never sold outside Brazil. The games included in the collection were made for children and are relatively basic, ranging from driving to platformers to shoot-'em-ups. None of the terrible games have been named, being only identified by numbers.

name: 2069 AD
summary: Japanese adult adventure game for the PC-98

name: 20 Games to Play With Your Mates
summary: 20 Games is a collection of games made for you and your mates. From zombie slaying to turn based strategy there are a great variety of games for local multiplayer and singleplayer.

name: 2048 Q
summary: 2048 Q is a game inspired by Gabriele Cirulli game.

2084 is a fast-paced First-Person Shooter with hacking mechanics. Battle your way through hordes of enemies, hack their minds to gain advantage on the battlefield, and immerse yourself in a riveting short story set in a grim cyberpunk landscape.

name: 2014.Aftermath
summary: Nevertheless, the world has perished. 35 years after the Nuclear Apocalypse, spent in the underground shelter, one of its inhabitants makes up his mind to find way out to the surface.

name: 20 Minute Metropolis
summary: Centuries after a nuclear war, you're charged with rebuilding civilization. It's your job to create a functioning city in 20 years (that's 20 minutes realtime!). Begin by laying roads to bring food to your people, then build apartments to give them somewhere to live. Extend your reach by cutting through forest and—oops, your apartments have filled up with waste, so you'll have to build a landfill. Where was I? Cut through forest to get to ancient skyscrapers, which you'll mine for metals and plastics—you're an ace recycler! Oops, your people have deforested the area. Expand! Set up a water turbine and energy transmitters. And some parks! Now you're cooking. Build a dozen high rises and more parks. Aaand you're out of time. How'd you do? You beat your high score! Now, how can you top it?

name: 2048 Battles
summary:
2048 is back with new twists!

Enjoy the classic game up to 8 players!

Play with history and rediscover various trivia.

Play with friends or enemies with three different modes and yup to 8 players!

Enjoy classic 2048, move game, time game and more!

Try different puzzle game situations, play alone or in multiplayer, and travel through different history periods.

Game can be played up to 8 players! Try 2 players, 4 players and 8 players mode!

name: 20XX: Tournament Edition
summary:
THE YEAR IS 20XX

Welcome to the next generation of Super Smash Bros. Melee. 20XXTE is a highly-polished Melee mod designed to completely replace vanilla Melee in any setting, home or tournament. It can be run on any Gamecube or Wii with nothing but a memory card and a special save file - no hacking or homebrew required.

Enter up to 8 characters on the Name Entry Screen. Save replays to watch and record later. Customize your menu music to set the mood between matches. Level up your swag factor by choosing from any of 18 custom shield colors. These and more have been coded specifically for 20XXTE, with usability in mind - you'll know how to use it from the second you get your hands on it.

name: 2020 The God of Highschool with Naver Webtoon
2002 A Doom Odyssey
summary: 2002 A Doom Odyssey is a 2002 megawad for The Ultimate Doom which replaces all four episodes. The project was organized by Paul Corfiatis, who designed most of the levels, and also composed the megawad's soundtrack.

name: 2012 Apocalypse
summary: It's a game based on a new film about the end of the world, predicted in the ancient Mayan calendar! Save the humanity from demolition by controlling the forces of four powerful natural phenomena - hurricane, earthquake,fire whirlwind and tornado. Each of the phenomena has its own destructive features! Following the plot of the namesake movie, send the natural disasters through the labyrinths of the city streets, trying to avoid any damage and collect various bonuses. In an additional game mode, you will have a completely opposite task of razing the cities. The more damage you will cause for the stipulated time - the more points you will earn. Let the natural anger out!

name: 2048 Bricks
summary: The legend is back! Play the famous hit «2048» in totally new addictive way! Drop bricks down and merge similar numbers to get 2048 and higher tiles. What’s your hightscore?

Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!

Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.

Get to the 2048 tile, and reach a high score!

name: 2048 Cat
summary: Mischievous cats are messing with your 2048 board. Well, how could you blame them if they are so cute!! Come and join them to play with 2048 game! How to play: Use joystick to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.

name: 2089: Space Divided
summary: 2089: Space Divided is a classic science fiction real-time strategy game in which you collect resources, build up your base, raise troops and destroy your opponents with tactical finesse.

name: 2020: The Ride
summary: 2020: THE RIDE is a year in review in the form of the world’s scariest VR roller coaster.

name: 2076: Midway Multiverse
summary: The multiverse is in danger! Take control of your space combat ship, fight the Nazi Galactic Empire and relive the thrills of classic scrolling shooters in a unique retro Virtual Reality experience.

name: 20b
summary: Eight peculiar students, a pair of highly-trained assassins, extraterrestrials plotting a full-scale invasion of Earth, a secret society on the verge of toppling the US presidency and a Doomsday cult gearing to wipe California off the map.

name: 20XX: Draco Character
summary: This DLC introduces Draco, a powerful playable Contractor who wields an endless arsenal of unique Weapons. Master the shadow-dashing Vega Claws and the platform-creating Rapture Bubble to destroy your foes in style!

name: 20,000 Miles Under the Sea
summary: Become a fearless underwater explorer and reach the bottom of The Mariana Trench to win 20,000* real dollars!

Coop sci-fi battleroyale action offline/online multiplayer game. It's 2300 AC, Beings from planet Venus are back and they declare WAR to humans with zombies. Play Singleplayer or Multiplayer, military weapons with autocombust ammo, make body parts fly, clear the area from deadly hordes, Just action!

name: 20x20x20
summary: 20x20x20 is a tiny maze game, where you must activate the four mysterious orbs to unlock the exit and escape the labyrinth. There are 20 rooms to navigate, and though a way through might not seem obvious at first, never fear! For you possess the uncanny ability to rearrange the rooms by scrolling the rows and columns. Keep an eye out for that meddling labyrinth goblin though...

name: 2048 Balls 3D
summary: Drop balls and merge them! How far can you go?

name: 20 Ladies
summary: Enter a world of simple pleasures and minimalistic design, where your only goal is to navigate cleverly arranged stages, avoid spikes and locate beautiful female companions hidden in the environment. But beware of hazards! Break a heart three times, and you’ll instantly respawn at the beginning, with your lady counter reset to zero. You’ll need to touch them all without dying in order to proceed to the next stage and unlock an alluring image for each one you complete. Platforms in the foreground are silhouetted against lush hand-drawn backdrops. Clouds pass by overhead, trees sway in the breeze and historical architecture dots the landscape as mellow tunes accompany you on a chill quest for love. Your best times are tracked with each playthrough, inviting you to come back and top your own record.

name: 2048 Animation Puzzle Edition
summary: 2048 Animation Puzzle Edition is a HTML5 Skill Game.
Nintendo Entertainment System version of 2048.

name: 2048: Sakura Trick Edition
summary: An online 2048 game themed around the yuri anime "Sakura Trick".

name: 20 Days
summary: Manage a company of 5 soldiers tasked with digging tunnels.
Have you done everything you need?

name: 20 Bunnies
summary: Find those hidden bunnies! Enter a world of simple pleasures and minimalistic design, where your only goal is to navigate cleverly arranged stages, avoid spikes and locate beautiful rabbit-eared companions hidden in the environment. But beware of hazards! Lose three hearts, and you’ll instantly respawn at the beginning, with your bunny counter reset to zero. You’ll need to find them all without dying in order to proceed to the next stage and unlock an adorable image for each one you complete.

name: 2048 Royal Cards
summary: 2048 is a classic puzzle with a simple goal; reach 2048. Move your tiles across the grid and merge identical numbers into one. Plan ahead and watch out for new tiles spawning, that may prevent you from joining your numbers.

name: 2045: Wasteland Rebuild
summary:
2045: Wasteland Rebuild is a mobile game with wasteland theme.
Here, You will incarnate in the army commander on the wasteland and the soldiers under the command to prevent the further spread of the world's darkness!

name: 2080 Apocalypse
summary: 2080 Apocalypse is a combination of action-adventure, mystery, 3d platforming puzzle game. In this semi-open world, You have must fight with dead robots and bring a master cube. beautiful adventure with dead robots.

name: 20 Minutes Till Dawn
summary: Shoot down an ever growing horde of Lovecraftian monsters to survive the night. Choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique and game-breaking builds. Unlock a diverse cast of characters and weapons with unique powers.

name: 2020 Celeste Spring Community Collab
summary: A sizeable mod for Celeste that adds a lot of unique content, such as levels and mechanics, to the game.

name: 2047 CCG
summary: Strategic CCG mobile game with a cyberpunk theme.

name: 20th Century Trivia Challenge
summary: 20th Century Trivia Challenge is a trivia game. It contains over 3,000 trivia questions and over 500 film clips. The game can be played by a single player or up to three teams can be formed to battle through questions topical for all periods of history.

Never before has a date in history been so significant to so many cultures, so many religions, scientists, and governments. 2012 is an epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors. Now you can test your survival skills by answering trivia questions in the new FREE adventure quiz game Survive 2012. Your goal is to reach Tibet and higher ground in order to survive the cataclysmic forces that will wreak havoc on our planet in 2012.

A Game Mod and fan prequel to the 2000 game Deus Ex that was released in September 2011.

Daniel, a mechanically augmented mercenary, is set to infiltrate Human Horizon, a biotech firm in Washington, D.C.. What appears to be a simple data heist mission ends up going awry when Daniel hacks a computer and, just before blacking out, has a mysterious computer bot infiltrate his mind.

Two years later, Daniel is on the run from the agents of Human Horizon and MJ12, and is being given a mission by the bot to find out about the Titan program.

This highly popular puzzle game will tickle your brain cells and test your mathematical skills!

This is an in-flight version of the game.

name: 20Q
summary: A guessing game in which the "20Q" A.I. will try to read your mind by asking a few simple questions. The object you think of should be something that most people would know about, but not a proper noun or a specific person, place, or thing.

name: 2048 Farmer in the Dell
summary: This is the classic game 2048 with music pictures and sounds related to the farmer in the dell nursery rhyme.

name: 20XX: Hawk Character
summary: This DLC introduces Hawk, a powerful playable Contractor capable of using 20XX's awesome Powers to the fullest.

name: 2048 7x7
summary: 2048 7x7 is another variant of the popular 2048 game. Here, it is played on a 7x7 grid and two new tiles are added each turn. Statistically speaking, this option should make it much easier to reach the tile with 2048 written on it.

name: 2048 Numbers Mania
summary:
2048 Numbers Mania will test your mathematical skills and ability to problem solve, despite its simple design.
Your ultimate impossible goal is to continually think about how to add pairs in order to clear more space on the board. Sounds simple? It's not!

name: 2032: A New Threat
summary: 2032 is an Indie game with unique features. By 2032, 50% of global vegetation had already been completely consumed by a pest called P-X. A world war arises for basic resources for survival. Spider, a renowned soldier of the armed forces is summoned.

name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
summary: A short arcade game about dodging lasers and pressing the right item.

name: 2048 Pool with Dido Angel
summary: This crazy game of pool is like no other, play balls against equal values to combine them and move up a level. As each ball multiplies new ones are released, and eventually you'll unlock the full striptease!

name: 2016 Doodle Fruit Games
summary: The 2016 Doodle Fruit Games was a mini-game collection made by Google to celebrate the 2016 Summer Olympics. The game was exclusive to the Google app for a limited time.

name: 2006 FIFA World Cup
summary: Mobile port of 2006 FIFA World Cup.

name: 2006 FIFA World Cup
summary: Xbox 360 version of 2006 FIFA World Cup.

name: 2006 FIFA World Cup
summary: PSP port of 2006 FIFA World Cup.

name: 2002 FIFA World Cup
summary: Old-gen port of 2002 FIFA World Cup.

name: 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa
summary: Wii port of 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa.

name: 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa
summary: PSP port of 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa.

name: 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa
summary: iOS port of 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa.

name: 20 Useless Apps
summary: Yes, 20 Useless Apps, from an egg-laying simulator to a scanner that counts the bacteria on your finger! This all-in-one useless app collection has it all! See what it's like to be dead using the death simulator! Witness breakthrough cliff-jumping A.I. technology! This useless collection has it all!

name: 2021: Moon Escape
summary: A classic 90's adventure that will keep you in suspense will make you smile at times and will thrill you in every moment!

name: 200 Days Zombie Apocalypse
summary: You must survive a Zombie-infested world.

name: 200 Tolerance
summary: When everything is tired and it can't go on like this anymore. Improve three characters, fight the regime in this dystopian arcade!

name: 2048 8x8
summary: A modified version of 2048 which increases the board size from 4x4 to 8x8.

name: 2048 9x9
summary: Merge the tiles together to make the 2048 tile, however this time in a 9x9 grid.

name: 20 Doors
summary: 20 Doors is an exploration, action and puzzle solving adventure where strange events and environments make you question your sanity.
A homebrew version of 2048 on the Sega Master System.

name: 2022 A Doom Odyssey
summary: 2022ado is a Boom/MBF compatible megawad (seriously a mega megawad) for the Ultimate Doom. It is a tribute to the original 2002ado released 20 years ago but with all new maps and music. The megawad has taken over 5 years to create.

Is your vision 20/20?
If You score below 20 you FAIL.

name: 2048 Game With New Levels
summary: Merge two numbers to go to next level and merge again to go to next highest level and the target will be 2048 and also you can change the target by going to settings.

name: 2099 Gravity Havoc
summary: Shoot at enemies in a WEIGHTLESS space station to save yourself from burning alive in the atmosphere!

name: 20 in 1
summary: Official compilation licensed from Sega by Tianli.

name: 2024 U.S. Election Simulator
summary: The 2024 U.S. Election Simulator puts you in control of an American election night like never before. Customize your very own political candidate and run a realistic campaign that leads up to election night!

name: 2048 Pool
summary: Collide two numbers of the same value so they merge into one. Your goal is to reach as high of a score as possible. Each hit takes some of your energy, however, colliding the balls replenishes the energy.

name: 2044 Moto Racer: Cyber Racing Simulator
summary: Unleash Your Inner Speed Demon in the Neon-Lit Streets!

name: 2001 TetRize
summary: In 2001, AxySoft publishes 2001 TetRize on Windows. This action and puzzle game is now abandonware and is set in a falling block puzzle theme.

Make a 2048 tile!

The game is played on a 4 x 4 board and the player starts with two number 2 tiles.

Each turn where the player makes a valid move, another number 2 tile is added to the game board (a valid move is moving the tiles, or combining tiles). If you try to move in such a way that no move is completed, a turn is not registered and no new number "2" is added to the board.

You make new tiles by combining the tiles already on the board. Combine 2 and 2 to make a 4, combine 4 and 4 to make an 8 and so on, combine a 1024 and 1024 to make a 2048.

Game over occurs when the board is full and you no longer have a valid move available (ie no way to move or combine tiles).

It sounds way more complex that it is.

name: 2048-F8
summary:
This is the classic modern-day mobile puzzle game 2048. The aim is to create a block containing the number 2048. When you move the controls in a direction, the blocks will move in that direction until they hit another block or the edge of the grid.

When a moving block meets a stationary block of the same value, they combine to create a block with double the value, which clears space on the grid.

Every time you make a move a new block is randomly placed on the grid, usually this will be a 2 but sometimes can be a 4. Should the grid fill up and there are no adjacent blocks of the same value to combine, the game is over and you will need to press the reset button.

Game Modes:
2048 - the game finishes when you achieve a block with a value of 2048. Try and achieve this in the quickest time possible!
Long - the game continues until you create the largest block possible of 131,072 or there are no more moves available.
Time - you have three minutes to achieve the highest score you can.

name: 2048 3D
summary: Control cubes and enjoy 2048 game in real 3D world! Be careful not to drop the cube outside the box!

name: 2003 Toshi Kaimaku: Ganbare Kyuukaiou
summary: 2003 Toshi Kaimaku: Ganbare Kyuukaiou is a Sports game, developed by Magical Company (Mahou) and published by Atlus, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: 20XX.io
summary: A platform MOBA

name: 200 Klassische Bucher
summary: An edutainment game for the Nintendo DS.
A port of 2048 for the Uzebox.
An unofficial port of 2048 for the WASM-4 fantasy console.

name: 20 Small Mazes
summary: This is a puzzle game with twenty small mazes. They're good mazes, though.

name: 20th Century Frog
summary: In 20th Century Frog, you play as a frog hopping around the screen to eat bugs and avoid deadly obstacles. Every alphanumeric key of the keyboard is used to control the movement of the frog, where the key's position relative to the space bar determines the direction and distance of the jump. Each hop consumes points, and each bug you eat replenishes them. If your points dip too far into the negative, the frog will perish. Eating ladybugs grants a "gimmick", a power up that can be used to counter a particular obstacle.

name: 2048 Units of /vr/
summary: This project contains 32 maps in the main wad, plus an additional 6 that didn't make the cut contained in the extra wad. Inspired by projects like MAYhem 2048 and Congestion 1024, we sought to make a project with similar restrictions: make a boom-compatible map where the playable areas are within a 2048x2048 unit space and optionally use textures from gothictx.

name: 200 Line Massacre: The Slaughtering
summary: 200 Line Massacre: The Slaughtering is a megawad (full 32 maps + 4 bonus) by @Arsinikk and @NinjaDelphox with the goal of making Vanilla slaughter-like maps under 200 lines. It is the sequel to 100 Line Massacre and also features additional mapping by @scwiba and @finnks13.

name: 203 Game Pack
summary: 203 Game Pack is a game compilation that is bundled in 505 Game Collection and 303 Game Collection.

name: 20MTD: Emberpath
summary: 20MTD: Emberpath is a spin-off of the acclaimed 20 Minutes Till Dawn. In this roguelike, you combine different abilities and artifacts to create an almighty character that can mow down waves of Lovecraftian creatures. Can you hold out against the horde, until the night is over?
An unofficial version of 2048 for the Commodore 16.

name: 2048 Puzzle: Evangelion Edition
summary: 2048 Puzzle: Evangelion Edition is an unofficial 2048 game based on the anime Neon Genesis Evangelion.

name: 2048 Puzzle: K-ON! Edition
summary: 2048 Puzzle: K-ON! Edition is a fanmade game based on the anime K-ON!. The gameplay is a clone of the browser game 2048.
A 2048 port which runs on the Libretro platforms.

name: 20 Words // 20 Seconds
summary: You have 20 seconds. For each prompt, type an English word that meets the criteria above. Words that you have used for an earlier criteria cannot be used again later.

name: 200 Line Christmas: Snowy Slaughter
summary:
200 Line Christmas: Snowy Slaughter is a community project targeting MBF21 (complevel 21). The project is inspired by Arsinikk and NinjaDelphox's Line Massacre Series and is the sequel to 100 Line Christmas. It uses the new Doom Christmas Enhanced resource pack with some new additions specific to the project.

As the 200 in the title suggests, each map was limited to 200 lines at most. Each mapper was asked to add some kind of friction in their maps (Either slippery ice or heavy snow). In addition, each map has a hidden runaway gnome for you to grab (replacing the item count)!

name: 2048 10x10
summary: Swipe and merge the tiles until you reach the 2048th tile, however this time in a 10x10 grid.

name: 2048 Blocks VR
summary: Merge blocks and get to 2048 in this simple VR puzzle game!
A horror visual novel about urban legends of Russian town in 2007.
2003 is a shoot-'em-up game that is bundled in the Timetop GameKing.
2004 is a shoot em up for the Timetop GameKing. The game is a sequel to 2003.

name: 2048: Dungeons
summary: A game that mixes 2048 puzzle mechanics with a roguelite style of play, creating deadly battles where staying calm and thinking strategically are essential for victory. Make improvements, train your character, recruit allies and try your luck in the terrible dungeon of Blockshire.

name: 2005: A Game of Macroeconomics
summary: An edutainment and economic simulator that was originally released for free by Worth Publishing as a learning tool for students.
A 2048 port for Vircon32.

name: 200 Hidden House Cats
summary: Uh-oh! 200 mischievous house cats are causing mayhem in homes everywhere! Embark on a purr-suit to find them all!

name: 2033 The Order
summary: A horizontal board strategy action adventure game, all actions require stamina consumption, manage stamina correctly, and fight with caution Attack, defense, rebound, roll, jump, stun, interrupt attack, and enhance various numerical values Rich mechanisms await discovery.
2024 is a homebrew SNES game based on the browser game 2048.

name: 2048: StarWars
summary: A fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game. Join the similar tiles and get to the 2048 tile!

name: 2048 Advance
summary: A homebrew port of 2048 to GBA and Web Browser.

name: 2048 Snake
summary: Imagine a mix of classic snake and puzzle game 2048 and there you have a unique gameplay in front of you that you can try right now. Run and grow your snake on different challenging levels and discover new big numbers on the cubes.
You are locked in a quiet apartment room. The only way out of the tightly closed door is to get to the truth of the case. Overcome your fear and try to escape.

name: 2048 Attack on Titan
summary: A 2048 clone based on the anime and manga "Attack on Titan" released on iOS devices. The game features 4x4, 5x5 and 6x6 boards.

name: 2048 3x3 4x4 5x5 6x6 7x7 8x8 9x9 10x10
summary: 2048 3x3 4x4 5x5 6x6 7x7 8x8 9x9 10x10 is a 2048 clone game which adds in various different modes into the game which increase the size of the game board.

name: 2048 11x11
summary: Swipe the tiles and get to the 2048 tile within a 11x11 board.

name: 2048 12x12
summary: Swipe the tiles and get to the 2048 tile within a 12x12 play field.

name: 20 Sector Challenge CBP
summary: The 20-sector Community Build Project somehow managed to be in development for seven years despite its simple concept: each participant was limited to 20 sectors per turn, but he could take any number of turns.

name: 2018 FIFA World Cup Russia
summary: Immerse yourself in the excitement and drama of football’s greatest event with an authentic tournament experience, featuring official FIFA World Cup elements. Play with all 32 qualified national teams, using the official match balls, in real-world stadiums, and compete for the iconic trophy – all rendered in stunning detail for the first time with the Frostbite game engine.

name: 2048 Maniac
summary: The game’s objective is to slide numbered tiles on a 4×4 grid and combine them to create a tile with higher numbers. The game is won when a tile with a value of 2048 appears on the board
A homebrew Commodore 64 version of the game 2048.

name: 2000s Rock Legends: Music Pack
summary: Get ready to rock with the '2000s Rock Legends' DLC for Smash Drums! Featuring iconic banger tunes from a decade of musical revolution, this pack brings you 5 of the most celebrated hits that defined the rock scene of the early millennium. Immerse yourself in the beats that fueled legendary festivals and iconic rock moments. Don't miss out on this blast from the past—turn up the volume and let the nostalgia kick in!

name: 2024: Mosaic Retrospective
summary: 2024: Mosaic Retrospective is a charity-fundraising picross/minesweeper hybrid featuring a single ENORMOUS puzzle inspired by global news stories from throughout the year.

name: 2017 Collection
summary: 2017 Collection is a six-level PWAD for Doom II designed for Boom-compatible source ports, created by James Collins (an_mutt). MAP05 was made in collaboration with Brayden Hart (AD_79). Four of the five levels in the WAD were previously released by an_mutt as part of the Scrapper collection

name: 2025: Tobi
summary: The second in Kibodo's classic game series. It is a vertical scrolling shooting game! Controls are left and right movement only. The game is over when the fighter runs out of bullets. Get items to replenish bullets and destroy the enemies in front of you! Aim for a high score!

name: 2024: Aliens Are Coming
summary: An Indie Sci-Fi Adventure game that thrusts you into the heart of the secrecy surrounding UFOs and Aliens. Visit exotic places, meet Aliens, make alliances and enemies alike as you make critical decisions and fight for what you think is right. Time is short, because it's 2024, and Aliens Are Coming!

name: 201: The Bad Number
summary: "201 - The Bad Number" is an interactive science fiction game-book set on a post-apocalyptic Mars. In a world where only 200 people remain, each new inhabitant may hasten civilization's end. Players make choices that impact the fate of humanity and the colony in a unique dystopian setting.

name: 2004Scape
summary: Lost City is a unofficial non-profit project focused on preservation through open-source emulation accessibility.

name: 20 Challenges: Episode 3 - The Tale from a Bone
2048 for Playdate
summary: Match identical tiles on your Playdate and try to reach 2048 in this port of the popular game.

name: 20 Challenges: Episode 4 - Temple of the Elements
20th Century Beauties
summary:
20th Century Beauties is a jigsaw puzzle game where each completed picture reveals a different icon of feminine flair - decked out in the stunning looks of her decade. From jazz lounges to power suits and hairspray, each puzzle peels back another layer of vintage charm.
Drag, drop, and take your time. Make it a challenge or do it with no rush. Just good company and better curves, wrapped in eras that knew how to make an entrance.

name: 2040World
summary:
2040 World is a free-to-play third-person MMO action game with extraction-based gameplay. You play as a mercenary operator, remotely controlling synthetic avatars used by powerful transnational corporations to explore a vast artificial megastructure simply known as The Station.

The Station is an entire world, created by an unknown advanced civilization for mysterious purposes. Explore its biomes, uncover rare minerals, study alien flora and fauna — and fight your way through hostile environments in pursuit of power and profit.

But be warned: avatars are not immortal. If one is lost, you’ll need to spend resources to build a new one. Master all five avatar classes to find the one that fits your playstyle.
Discover over 30 unique weapons, divided into three damage types, and mix and match armor pieces to achieve maximum protection in combat.

The economy of 2040 World thrives on player interaction. Use the in-game marketplace to trade resources, weapons, and gear — and strengthen your position in the world.

name: 2048Puzzle
summary: A 2D sliding tile-merging puzzle game inspired by 2048.

Congratulations! You are selected to work in the Media Regulation Branch to safeguard NewMerican values. Dive into this dystopian puzzle game; censor newspapers, discover secrets, and ban those who oppose NewMerica.

name: 2048 Bosses
summary: 2048 Bosses is an addictive puzzle roguelike where you can combine skills and characters to create game-breaking builds to destroy powerful bosses using your 2048 score. Discover the routes that lead to each enemy and counter their moves with your upgrades.

name: 2048x2048
summary: Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!

In the globally popular classic puzzle game, slide blocks with fingertips and challenge the ultimate goal of "2048" by merging the same numbers! The rules are simple yet full of depth, and each step requires careful planning, testing your logical thinking and spatial strategy abilities.

name: 20XX / 30XX
summary:
Jump, shoot, and slash your way through 20XX and 30XX in the ultimate co-op action-platformer roguelike collection!

This physical edition includes both 20XX and 30XX for Nintendo Switch on a single Game Card, as well as:

A double-sided 14 page instruction booklet featuring character bios and boss info
A digital download code for a copy of the complete soundtrack
Two kiss-cut sticker sheets
A 9x12 inch double-sided folded poster with a comprehensive list of in-game augments on each side
Reversible cover with double-sided artwork

name: 2048 Art
summary:
2048art is a classic puzzle with a simple goal; reach 2048.
Move your tiles across the grid and merge identical numbers into one. Plan ahead and watch out for new tiles spawning, that may prevent you from joining your numbers.

name: 2023: Alien Bugs Invade Earth
summary: Why are alien insectoids invading Earth in 2023? This narrative driven 2D shooter pits you against a seemingly hopeless battle against the invading Insectoids. How will you (and Earth) manage to survive? What hidden technological, historical, and spiritual secrets will you discover as a result?

name: 20 Days
summary: Survive 20 tense days aboard a failing spaceship while hunting down an enemy satellite. Every day brings new malfunctions, random story events, and difficult choices. Will you find the target before it's too late?

name: 20-in-1 Bundle: Megapack Collection!
summary: Enjoy a treasure chest of fun with the Megapack Collection – 20 games in one bundle! This pack is perfect for families and players of all ages who want lighthearted, accessible entertainment. 20 varied titles that are easy to pick up and play.

name: 201 Street
summary:
Malsivus is throwing their first annual Halloween festival! Leticia's over the moon, but Billie's less than enthused. Join them on the Halloween of a lifetime.

Face your fears.

name: 20 Days to Find Amy
summary:
20 Days To Find Amy is a short, single player, hidden object puzzle.

The story has the player returning home after being away for many years, she arranges to meet her friend but on arrival her friend, referred to as Anna throughout the game, is nowhere to be found. The twenty days referred to are the twenty levels within the game, each level contains one to three hidden object puzzles and for each level the player is given five hints. In levels with multiple puzzles it is possible to partially complete one puzzle, exit, start another puzzle and thus manage the use of the limited hints between them.

name: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea: Extended Edition
summary: Help Captain Nemo's three captives escape from the Nautilus.

name: 20 in 1 Family Games Mega Collection
summary: 20 games, one epic collection — fun for everyone!
